title: Mediterranean Quinoa Salad
description: A healthy mix of quinoa, cucumber, tomatoes, olives, feta cheese, and a lemon-oregano dressing.

title: Grilled Shrimp Caesar Salad
description: Fresh grilled shrimp served over crispy romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing and parmesan.

title: Roasted Beet and Goat Cheese Salad
description: Roasted beets paired with tangy goat cheese, arugula, and a balsamic glaze.

title: Sweet Potato and Kale Salad
description: A warm salad featuring roasted sweet potatoes, fresh kale, quinoa, and a honey mustard dressing.

title: Thai Peanut Chicken Salad
description: Grilled chicken, shredded cabbage, carrots, and cilantro topped with a spicy Thai peanut dressing.

title: Cobb Salad
description: A hearty salad with grilled chicken, avocado, bacon, hard-boiled eggs, tomatoes, and blue cheese.

title: Caprese Salad
description: Fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, basil, and a drizzle of balsamic vinegar. Simple and classic.

title: Green Goddess Chicken Salad
description: It is a non-vegetarian salad which consists of the green goddess dressing mixed with chicken, peppers, olives and celery.

title: Asian Cucumber Salad
description: Asian Cucumber Salad Recipe made with crunchy cucumber, onion, rice wine vinegar, and a few secret ingredients!
